  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController

    public class StatusController
extends AbstractEntityController
    IController instance to handle user requests regarding a Status.

        statusText - the Status text
        statusComment - the Status comment

      • putFormIntoSession

        public void putFormIntoSession(Form form,
                               ninja.session.Session session)
        Puts status data from a user interface form into the session instance.

        Checks every status value from session instance for null value. If status value is null it will be replaced by a whitespace character.

        Specified by:
        putFormIntoSession in interface IController
        Overrides:
        putFormIntoSession in class AbstractEntityController
        Parameters:
        form - the Ninja StatusForm instance
        session - the Ninja Session instance

      • putDtoIntoSession

        public void putDtoIntoSession(Dto dto,
                              ninja.session.Session session)
        Puts status data from a user interface form into the session instance.

        Checks every status value from session instance for null value. If status value is null it will be replaced by a whitespace character.

        Specified by:
        putDtoIntoSession in interface IController
        Overrides:
        putDtoIntoSession in class AbstractEntityController
